modName: Guards attack thugs assassins and more
summary: Guards will not fight thugs. Until now.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#3f3f3f][font=Impact][SIZE=7]GUARDS ATTACK THUGS, [/SIZE][/font][/color][/center][center][color=#3f3f3f][font=Impact][SIZE=7]ASSASSINS, AND MORE [/SIZE][/font][/color][/center]

[center][color=#7030a0][font=Impact][size=5]THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR 1K DOWNLOADS![/size][/font][/color][/center]


[font=Impact][size=5][color=#366092]Bethesda thought it would be a good idea to watch an innocent citizen get hacked to pieces by thugs for hire while guards just stood there. This changes that. Guards will now attack hired thugs, assassins, along with dueling mages, [If you decline to duel them] and visa versa. [/color][/size][/font]
[center][font=Impact][size=5].................................................................................................................................[/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=Impact][color=#ff0000][size=6]VIDEOS[/size][/color][/font][/center]

[youtube]GxfJgSXVy_Y[/youtube] [youtube]MT8B1Unv7KY[/youtube]
[youtube]2r_EqW6Ji50[/youtube]
[center][font=Impact][size=5].................................................................................................................................[/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=Impact][size=6][color=#fac08f]PLANNED UPDATES[/color][/size][/font][/center]
[center][color=#fac08f][font=Impact][size=6]-Guards remove loot from thieves[/size][/font][/color][/center][center][font=Impact][size=6][color=#fac08f]-Guards will attack you if you take loot from thieves[/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Impact][size=6][color=#fac08f]-Guards thank you for helping defeat bandits and thevies[/color][/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=Impact][size=5].................................................................................................................................[/size][/font][/center]
[center][color=#4bacc6][font=Impact][size=6]CHANGELOG[/size][/font][/color][/center]
[center][font=Impact][size=6][color=#4bacc6]V1.1 [/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Impact][size=6][color=#4bacc6]-Guards now attack assassins[/color][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Impact][size=6][color=#4bacc6]-Guards will attack challengers in wizard duels if you decline to duel them and they attack you[/color][/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=Impact][size=5].................................................................................................................................[/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=Impact][color=#953734][SIZE=7]THANK YOU[/SIZE][/color][/font][/center][center][color=#953734][font=Impact][SIZE=7]FEEL FREE TO POST A COMMENT OR VIDEO![/SIZE][/font][/color][/center]
author: Saadz

files.name: Guards Fight Thugs and Assassins UPDATE V1.1
files.fileName: Guards Fight Thugs and Assassins UPDATE V1.1-55400-V1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Guards will now attack assassins
Guards will attack challengers in wizard duels if you decline to duel them and they attack you!
